text: Location of Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region. Výrava is a village and municipality in the Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region of far north-eastern Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1557. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 368 metres and covers an area of 20.243 km². It has a population of about 160 people. ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20071217080336/http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Medzilaborce District
title: Výrava (Medzilaborce District)
